title: "Clue": A 30th Anniversary Screening in 35mm Film
desc: Please join SVA Theatre for a special 30th anniversary presentation of the cult classic murder mystery,  Clue , shown on the big screen on 35mm film. ?The film premiered on December 13th, 1985. ? Synopsis: Six guests are invited to a strange house and must cooperate with the staff to solve a murder mystery. Starring Tim Curry, Madeline Kahn, and Christopher Lloyd. Directed by Jonathan Lynn. Running time: 94 minutes. ? Clue  is rated PG, and may not be suitable for young children. We ask parents not to bring children under the age of six. ? Ticket Information This event is free and open to the public. ? Seating is on a first-come, first-served basis. ? An Eventbrite reservation does not guarantee you a seat.  ?General Admission RSVPs through Eventbrite are appreciated, but not necessary. You do not need to show your Eventbrite reservation for admission. ?Doors will open at approximately 2:15PM. ? Concessions Information Concessions are not available for purchase at SVA Theatre. ?Guests are welcome to bring food and drink. ?Glass bottles are not permitted. Please contact svatheatre@sva.edu with questions.
